marklogic.body: I thought Arsenio was completely disgusting in the way he in the board room. I n real life he would have been fired on the Spot. Aubrey did design the package and come up with the ideas that the execs liked Aresenio did nothing...His stage presence was good...Â Never the less to like he did and say the things he did was really out of line ... He had no real reason to go Off.. he doesnt like her so what... I used to like him but not now.. and If I were Walgreen I would not want an abusive time bomb woman hater representing my business....
